summary: Chop wood for slightly longer but not so you can leave the game. This just cuts down on player's needing to constantly activate the block.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=44]LOT -- Easier Wood Chopping[/size][/center]
[size=4]Description[/size]
This is a very simple mod that allows the player to chop wood three times as longer than usual. A simple edited script file that you can extract into your "<Game Directory>/Data/scripts/" folder.

This is intended to keep some realism in the game as the player cannot simply walk away from their PC.

This mod goes extremely well with my other mod that allows you to create arrows at any blacksmith forge! Click [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48897/?]here[/url] to view it.
author: LegendOfThunder
